description: Explore how blockchain technology is transforming the digital advertising industry by enhancing transparency, combating ad fraud, ensuring data privacy, and streamlining payments. Discover its potential applications and the challenges of adoption.
keywords: Blockchain, Digital Advertising, Ad Fraud, Transparency, Data Privacy, Smart Contracts, Decentralized Ad Exchanges, Tokenized Impressions, Customer Experience
title: Transforming the Landscape: Blockchain and Digital Advertising
